page.title: 18THE FISH FACTORY
page.content: THE BURRA FISH FACTORY HAS BEEN HERE FOURTEEN YEARS.WE WENT TO THE BOSS OF THE FISH FACTORY AND HE SAID HE DIDN'T LIKE THE SMELL VERY MUCH.EACH DAY THEY WORK TEN HOURS.THE MOST POPULAR FISH THAT THEY GET IS THE HADDOCK.THE LAST PERSON TO GO OUT OF THE FACTORY GOES OUT AT FIVE O,CLOCK EACH NIGHT.A MAN CALLED A.J.HENRY OWNED IT FIRST.THEY HAVE THIRTEEN FILLETERS,SIX PACKERS AND THERE ARE TWENTY THREE PEOPLE WORKING IN THE FACTORY.THE FACTORY IS PLACED ABOUT SIXTY YARDS AWAY FROM THE BURRA BRIDGE AT EASTERDALE.THE OTHER FISH THEY DEAL WITH ARE WHITING,COD AND SAND EELS. ALL OF THE PEOPLE WHO WORK THERE ARE FROM BURRA BUT THE BOSS IS A MAN FROM SCALLOWAY.A BONUS FROM WORKING IN THE FISH FACTORY IS THAT YOU GET A FREE FRY OF FISH .
